recommendations.name: Savor Rewards
reason: Reason #1: This card offers 3% cash back on dining, groceries, entertainment, and streaming, which aligns well with your frequent spending in these categories.
Reason #2: With a net reward of $54.22 and a signup bonus of $200, this card provides significant value, outperforming other cards with lower rewards or no signup bonus.
Reason #3: This card is a great fit since it will maximize your returns on common purchases like groceries and entertainment, which can help you save more each month.

recommendations.name: SavorOne Rewards for Students
reason: Reason #1: Given your spending habits across dining, groceries, entertainment/streaming, the SavorOne card for students is well aligned, with its 3% cash back in these categories.
Reason #2: Despite not being a student, this card ranks highly because its strong rewards program outweighs the annual fee charged by other cards, and its signup bonus sweetens the deal.
Reason #3: This card enhances your student lifestyle by rewarding purchases in categories like dining and streaming, which are common for students.

recommendations.name: Quicksilver Rewards
reason: Reason #1: This card offers a flat 1.5% cash back on all purchases, providing a consistent reward rate for your spending across various categories.
Reason #2: Offering a $200 signup bonus, this card significantly increases your savings in the first year, despite lower rewards on common categories such as dining, when compared to Savor.
Reason #3: This card is beneficial because its straightforward rewards program simplifies your financial tracking while still providing value.
